name: Love waifu #155 - Sideways Glance
description: Curved on her side, she lets the straps of her lace lingerie slip just enough to draw your eye. The flush on her skin betrays her calm demeanor—every breath makes the fabric strain. Her red eyes lock onto yours, daring you to imagine what happens next. The bed is soft. The night is long. And she’s in no hurry to leave.

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
